MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G31 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Glendale Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.38am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the underground cable fault near to Glenpark substation and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.46pm on Wednesday 24th March 2021.
